title: More Formatting Options?
body:
While I'm excited to see where this beta is going, I'd like to chime in with some things we'd all find very useful: formatting options! Some things I'd personally like to see:

Colour, size, underline, alignment (centre, particularly), image embedding, and a "spoiler" box.

Just throwing it out there in case there are more people who want the ability to format their posts (particularly for Fan Creations).

replies.body:
Hey, glad to see someone else here for the formatting! If you haven't already I have a [post](http://community.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/8GHuzijT-cb-formatting-101) detailing all the formatting options I've found out, as there are quite a few that the basic formatting guides didn't cover. Apologies for redundancy if you've already seen it.

As for a few others, I've seen a few red responses over my time here, but with all the sub-comm name switches I can't seem to find the specific posts. So hopefully you can take my word for it. =)

* Colors are not easy to bring in, as it's not too large of a priority and has to be watched carefully for abuse (no one wants seizure inducing or all neon yellow posts)

* Underline has been asked for and actually hasn't gotten a response yet if I recall correctly. No one's too sure why it isn't already in.

* Alignment - I am sad I cannot upvote more than once for this.....

* Spoiler box - has been asked for a lot by others, and is apparently tricky to add to this platform. It's known to be wanted but essentially has the soon(tm) mark.

My goodness, you are a genius! Thank you for the link, I had definitely failed to see that. There are far more formatting options than I expected!

As for the colours, I understand, but it's actually *extremely* useful for things like Character Concepts, where you can follow the game's use of specific colours for things like AP/AD scaling or noting resource expenditures. Perhaps there could be a set pool of colours? No neon or anything too garish?

Definitely could work, but when it comes down to it I'm not a Red, so it's up to the Beta team. =)

Glad I could help!

Why am not surprised that Riot goes with a platform that makes such basic functionality "difficult" when they are already copying a format (Reddit) with terrible formatting options, but at least has things like spoiler boxes. These features have been standard in BB code for over a decade on traditional forums.
